td6.data

Interface Ghost

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Entity
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GhostImpl

    public interface Ghost
extends Entity
    interface of ghost which allow to have and modify data about a ghost
    Invariants :
    corridor.x == x and corridor.y == y
